  <tr>

   <tr>
    <td style="height: 30px" align="center">个人介绍</td>
    <td colspan="2" style="height: 30px">&nbsp;毕业于北京邮电大学计算机科学与技术学院计算机应用专业，获工学博士学位。现为计算机学院教授，博士生导师，中国计算机学会高级会员，IEEE和ACM会员。长期从事计算机应用和网络领域的科研和教学工作。指导博士和硕士研究生多名。<br>目前主要从事物联网、区块链、大数据分析与挖掘方面的研究工作。作为负责人和主研人完成20多项国家自然科学基金、973项目、863项目、省部级研究项目以及企业合作项目。近年来物联网和大数据关键技术方面做出一系列创新的研究成果，在IEEE&nbsp;TC,&nbsp;TETC,&nbsp;THMS,&nbsp;TDSC,&nbsp;ISJ,&nbsp;PMC等国内外期刊和学术会议上已发表论文50余篇，SCI、EI收录30余篇，文章他引60余次。申请相关专利多项。<br></td>
  </tr>
  <tr>
    <td style="height: 30px" align="center">承担课题</td>
    <td colspan="2" style="height: 30px">&nbsp;主持：<br>国家自然科学基金面上项目“数据供应链模型及关键技术研究”；<br>国家自然科学基金面上项目“无线多媒体感知反应网络信息质量保障的关键技术研究”；<br>国家自然科学基金面上项目“基于SoC的智能感知节点关键技术的研究”；<br>参与：<br>国家重点基础研究发展计划（973计划）项目“物联网体系结构基础研究”；&nbsp;<br>国际科技合作计划“中芬基于LivingLab的智慧设计创新网络平台研发与应用示范”。<br></td>
  </tr>
  <tr>
    <td style="height: 30px" align="center">获奖和成果</td>
    <td colspan="2" style="height: 30px">&nbsp;第一完成人设计并开发的物联网综合实验箱，在教育部主办的第三届高等学校自制实验教学仪器设备评选中获得优秀奖。</td>
  </tr>

30px">代表性论文：<br>(1)Yan&nbsp;Sun#,&nbsp;Tin-Yu&nbsp;Wu,&nbsp;Xin-ming&nbsp;Li,&nbsp;Mohsen&nbsp;Guizani.&nbsp;"A&nbsp;Rule&nbsp;Verification&nbsp;System&nbsp;for&nbsp;Smart&nbsp;Buildings".&nbsp;IEEE&nbsp;Transactions&nbsp;on&nbsp;Emerging&nbsp;Topics&nbsp;in&nbsp;Computing,&nbsp;2017,&nbsp;Volume:5,&nbsp;Issue:3,&nbsp;Page(s):367-379.<br>(2)Yan&nbsp;Sun#,&nbsp;TIN-Yu&nbsp;Wu,&nbsp;Guotao&nbsp;Zhao,&nbsp;Mohsen&nbsp;Guizani.&nbsp;"Efficient&nbsp;Rule&nbsp;Engine&nbsp;for&nbsp;Smart&nbsp;Building&nbsp;Systems",&nbsp;IEEE&nbsp;Transactions&nbsp;on&nbsp;Computers,&nbsp;JUN,2015,&nbsp;Volume:64,&nbsp;Issue:6,&nbsp;Page(s):1658-1669.<br>(3)Yan&nbsp;Sun#,&nbsp;Xukai&nbsp;Wang,&nbsp;Hong&nbsp;Luo,&nbsp;Xiangyang&nbsp;Li.&nbsp;"Conflict&nbsp;Detection&nbsp;Scheme&nbsp;Based&nbsp;on&nbsp;Formal&nbsp;Rule&nbsp;Model&nbsp;for&nbsp;Smart&nbsp;Building&nbsp;Systems",&nbsp;IEEE&nbsp;Transactions&nbsp;on&nbsp;Human-Machine&nbsp;Systems,&nbsp;APR,&nbsp;2015,&nbsp;Volume:45,&nbsp;Issue:2,&nbsp;Page(s):215-227.<br>(4)Yan&nbsp;Sun#,&nbsp;Hong&nbsp;Luo,&nbsp;Das,&nbsp;S.K,&nbsp;“A&nbsp;Trust-Based&nbsp;Framework&nbsp;for&nbsp;Fault-Tolerant&nbsp;Data&nbsp;Aggregation&nbsp;in&nbsp;Wireless&nbsp;Multimedia&nbsp;Sensor&nbsp;Networks”,&nbsp;IEEE&nbsp;Transactions&nbsp;on&nbsp;Dependable&nbsp;and&nbsp;Secure&nbsp;Computing,&nbsp;2012,&nbsp;Volume:&nbsp;9&nbsp;,&nbsp;Issue:&nbsp;6&nbsp;,&nbsp;Page(s):&nbsp;785&nbsp;–&nbsp;797.<br>(5)Yan&nbsp;Sun#,&nbsp;Tin-Yu&nbsp;Wu,&nbsp;Xinwei&nbsp;Liu,&nbsp;and&nbsp;Mohsen&nbsp;Guizani,&nbsp;“Multi-layered&nbsp;Impact&nbsp;Evaluation&nbsp;Model&nbsp;for&nbsp;Attacking&nbsp;Missions”,&nbsp;IEEE&nbsp;SYSTEM&nbsp;JOURNAL,&nbsp;2016,&nbsp;Volume:10,&nbsp;Issue:4,&nbsp;Page(s):1304-1315.<br>(6)Yan&nbsp;Sun#,&nbsp;Tin-Yu&nbsp;Wu,&nbsp;Xiaoqiong&nbsp;Ma,&nbsp;Han-Chieh&nbsp;Chao.&nbsp;"Modeling&nbsp;and&nbsp;verifying&nbsp;EPC&nbsp;network&nbsp;intrusion&nbsp;system&nbsp;based&nbsp;on&nbsp;timed&nbsp;automata",&nbsp;Pervasive&nbsp;and&nbsp;Mobile&nbsp;Computing,&nbsp;Dec,2015,&nbsp;Volume:24,&nbsp;Page(s):61-76.<br>(7)Yan&nbsp;Sun#,&nbsp;Ruosi&nbsp;Wang,&nbsp;Xinming&nbsp;Li.&nbsp;"A&nbsp;Distributed&nbsp;Rule&nbsp;System&nbsp;for&nbsp;Smart&nbsp;Building",&nbsp;Adhoc&nbsp;&amp;&nbsp;Sensor&nbsp;Wireless&nbsp;Networks,&nbsp;2015,&nbsp;Volume:29,&nbsp;Issue:&nbsp;1-4,&nbsp;Page(s):1-29.<br>(8)Yan&nbsp;Sun#,&nbsp;Shaoju&nbsp;Tang,&nbsp;Hong&nbsp;Luo,&nbsp;“Advanced&nbsp;Gateway&nbsp;Based&nbsp;on&nbsp;FPGA&nbsp;for&nbsp;Smart&nbsp;Home”,&nbsp;AD&nbsp;HOC&nbsp;&amp;&nbsp;SENSOR&nbsp;WIRELESS&nbsp;NETWORKS,&nbsp;Vol.22,&nbsp;No.1-2,&nbsp;Sep.&nbsp;2014,pp.&nbsp;135-156<br>(9)Yan&nbsp;Sun#,&nbsp;Xiaoqiong&nbsp;Ma,&nbsp;Hong&nbsp;Luo,&nbsp;“A&nbsp;General&nbsp;Description&nbsp;Schema&nbsp;of&nbsp;&nbsp;Services&nbsp;for&nbsp;WSNs”,&nbsp;Chinese&nbsp;Journal&nbsp;of&nbsp;Electronics,&nbsp;Vol.23,&nbsp;No.3,&nbsp;July&nbsp;2014,&nbsp;pp.&nbsp;604-610.<br><br></td>
